lines.text: Perception check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That thing you hate doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm good at perceiving things, I'm just not good at reading people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what we need to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad. 23?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hydroponics. No ground, just grow it above.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pattern of decay that followed your initial attempt at reviving this vicinity, all had a very distinct downward motion of draining. There was something about the ground, something beneath the tree and where you are that is seemingly taking the life force of the surroundings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, my god, what if the vampire thing is right underneath us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, can I still see the green being sucked down a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, all the life force was very quickly drained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my Primeval Awareness and sense any sort of vampiric presence within our very close vicinity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the radius on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a minute. It's up to six miles if I spend six minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you take your time, and you begin to focus and it expands. As you do, focusing on vampiric presence, you feel a fair amount of presence: above, below and further north. And smattered throughout the city. You get the sensation at this point in time that there is much more beyond just Lord Briarwood that have come to be a creature of the night in this city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) That's good. Bad. Probably bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The ground is tainted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm exhausted.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just a straight intelligence check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doing that on the go is too intricate.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it may be functional. It's definitely possible to use what you extracted from the behir to be a way to charge your Diplomacy, but that is something that you'll have to do in a controlled space when you have everything at your disposal. It's a very delicate process to even attempt it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we get it.

lines.text: I'll take first watch.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know it's not

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think if we find him, kill him, and leave his body on some sort of public display, it would sow some seeds of rebellion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it would be the beginning. He's who everybody's afraid of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could hang him in the tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could hang him in the tree.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just say the word.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys take your watches and go to sleep in the cold interior, and it is a cold interior of the tavern. As the night comes through, this is your first time really staying the night in the center of Whitestone. Even though you slept in the forest, in the boughs of the trees itself, the temperature grows far colder here, and even with the warm interior, the windows frost over and you find yourselves having to huddle or build some sort of small fire to even keep a semblance of comfort to rest. You all eventually go to sleep throughout your various times. I would like everyone to make a wisdom saving throw. With advantage, because you're still affected by the Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whispers and voices familiar, unfamiliar, seeing yourself pulled from your physical self into the heart of this banshee, then wrest from death, barely, cackling in the distance. I want you to go ahead and mark on your sheet one point of corruption.

lines.text: Oh.

lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know where that is on the sheet!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could be evil. We could turn evil here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you wake up, you find yourself wracked by those nightmares, a sense of nervousness comes to you. And there's a tremor to your voice now that's uncontrollable. At times of silence, you find yourself impulsively clearing your throat. And with that we're going to take a five-minute break.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right guys, keep this to a stringent five-minute break so we can get to as much as we can before the show's up tonight. So we'll see you guys here in five minutes? All right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back everyone. So, a couple quick things. One, we're roughly 30 to 25 subs away from our next milestone. The milestone, as we do with every 100 subs, the winner in the chat room, as long as you're active in it, gets a package of one of our signed cast photos, as well as a wonderful poster art piece from our artist, Kit Buss, signed by the cast, and that will also be our 10k mark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn, damn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Skittles, motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty fantastic. So, as soon as we hit that we'll have our next giveaway and a big celebration as we hit 10k.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get yourself a double cheeseburger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Look at the Sun Tree!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not just Batman things. All sorts of things in geek culture and-- what's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's more than Batman! It's crazy! I pop up there every now and then to answer some questions and talk about some cool things, as well as a number of other cool personalities that pop in and out. Check it out if you're around on Tuesday. It's a lot of fun. All righty. So let's kick back into this. So, a rough morning's rest come to fruition. Percy seems a little worse for wear after the evening's sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You guys step out into the day's sun. Today is fairly overcast. Clouds have taken the sky, and there is a bit of a light mist that is falling. Not quite rain, but not quite drizzle, but just a mist in the air. It's a cold day. The ground and most of the walkways and roads are a little damp due to the moisture in the air. Not muddy, just a little bit of a packed wetness to it. As you head over towards Beyond the Horizon, and that lies more in the northwestern quadrant of the city. A little ways around the street from one of the noble houses, so you keep a wide berth. You come to the row of shops that bookended it before, and you go to the curiosity shop to find that the building itself is partially collapsed and ruined. The door is torn off the hinges and left to the side. Part of the ceiling is fallen in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a basement?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking about the inside, most of the furniture has been broken or taken. You can see a bunch of shelves set up as this was once a curiosity shop. Empty. Anything of worth has long been taken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi, Grandma! Any yo-yos in there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking, boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Occasional rat seems to crawl out in the distance a little (rat squeaking) sound. But there is no other sign of life within the interior. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, with no advantage, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, until noon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Until 2PM, yo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom check, not saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, never mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would have been an eight.

lines.text: Eight. Okay. You take a while pushing through some of the rubble, checking behind the main desk, if you will, as to where most purchases would have taken place. The place is cleared out, and looks like it's covered in enough dust to have been left here for the better part of six months to a year.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't see any kind of like door that leads to a cellar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about, you find what looks to be a small cellar door that opens up in the floor in one of the back rooms. You open it up, there's a small ladder, not even a staircase, a ladder that leads down in there. It's a small room, about ten foot by ten foot. That room is also entirely cleaned out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. No yo-yos here, boy.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's half-collapsed, it would not be very protected.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just take a walkabout and see if there's anything else around the area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to head in one of the directions of the mansions?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head to the closest mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a deep brown. A lot of it appears to be like natural stained wood from the local forest surrounding Whitestone, with highlights of deep green and black. There does not appear to be any immediate sign of life from the inside, but there does appear to be a light coming from the inside, so even at this point in the day, it can be dark on the interior. You can see a little bit of light coming from one of the doors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a mailbox with a name? (laughter)

lines.text: Are there guards out front or anything, or is it just a gate?

lines.text: It's just a gate, currently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to go in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keron. Keron?

lines.text: Kerrion.

lines.text: Is that actually what you're saying?

lines.text: Are you feeling all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you look a little pale, Percy.

lines.text: I am a little pale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's kind of like the game show problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you know.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: I just had a bad night's sleep, that's all.

lines.text: Do you have a fever?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just a little peasant boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My nice jacket. We can ask around. See if we can manage to ask somebody without arousing--

lines.text: Is anyone else on the street?

lines.text: Right now, in this particular area, there is nobody on the street. You passed a few folks. A lot of them seem to be traveling southward.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: And you hear the distant (muffled stomping noise).

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's coming around the bend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, wait. Are the gates locked?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to take a little walk and let it pass by. Let's go to the Lady's Chamber.

lines.text: Lady's Chambers, anyone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Towards the Lady's Chamber. We're not going in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's full of prostitutes, Grog. Full.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll see. It's not really that complicated.

lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys dart southward across the road, ducking into the alleys of the southern portion of the road, getting out of the visual range of the zombie giant that is making its way down the road, across your path. Heading southward, you dart through the back alleys and keeping free of the main central visual areas of the city, you eventually make your way to the corner that houses the Lady's Chamber. And as you guys see it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we passed any people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In some of the alleyway, you do pass a couple that are holding some, what looks like either scavenged groceries or some sort of food they have keeping close to themselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I go talk to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, indeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to come with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As they're both walking by, keeping the hush, they see you guys step in the same alley. They stop for a second, looking you over, give a nod.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi, excuse me? My papa sent me to send a present, a gift of sorts, to a Sir Keri? Kurion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kerrion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kerrion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kerrion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just looking to see where we can deliver the gift.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan's forte. Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both stop and the man gives her a look like he's trying to usher her along, pulling her arm and she goes, "No, honey, it's just a child." Walks up and leans forward and says, "If you're "looking for Sir Kerrion, you'll find him in the extravagant abode to the southeast of the city."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one right over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's where he stays. Near the farming area south of us. You're not from here are you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're new to town.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's blind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I just need to bring him this sack of presents, or my papa will whip me pretty bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: TMI.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then perhaps you could do that quickly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're so pretty and clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She blushes for a second, goes like, "You stay safe." And brushes the hair out of your eyes for a second and pinches your cheek a little bit, and there's a look of sadness in her eyes, almost like, what horrible fate befalls this child, if he's not careful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I smack him on the back of the head and say: Let's go boy! Keep up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She rushes back to the side of the man with her and, "See, it's fine. Good luck!" And they both dart off down the alley again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam Riegel, ladies and gentleman, he played Gavroche in Les Mis. Gavroche, right here, Gavroche.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On Broadway. Literally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is Oliver Twist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Consider yourself! (speaking) Oh, that's a different show.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was ready! I was ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Erathis looks over us. There will be a time in which our salvation will come. And he goes into this very rallying speech and trying to lift the spirits of those around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said there was 40?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four. Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they're allowed to assemble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's four around him in the amphitheater. There are probably another ten or so scattered about the various ground surrounding it, just doing their own private prayer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have an opinion on Yennen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yennen? From your previous experience and what you've heard is a very-- can be a bit arrogant in his worship, but not in a way that is considered dangerous or impactful to when the de Rolo families were in rule. He does good for the people. Kind of a tool at times. But he practices well and he keeps the people's spirits up for those who worship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We found him a bit obnoxious to our means and ends on occasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On occasion, but mostly just his personality. Nothing he's done personally. He's not a bad person, by any means. He's just, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's also not a lapdog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Strong-willed in his ideas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we insight check him to see if it seems like he's changed at all, or if he's still that same douchebag or if he's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have no basis of comparison. You would be the only one that has.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk up to the little meeting. Is it wrapping up right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems like it's winding down. He finishes the discussion about the bonds of community, speaks about this city sprang up from nothing, but has a greater destiny to itself. If not here at Whitestone, one day we will all go past these boundaries, these borders, and create our own cities. There is hope for this. And then begins to go into a couple of familiar prayers tailored specifically to the Erathis way of thinking, and then finishes and everyone looks up, bows their heads for a second and begin to stand up and walk away from the amphitheater as he turns around and begins to clear off one of the back benches for him to sit on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to just walk up and start a conversation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You walk up to him, he sits down. "Can I help you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think there's any hope for Whitestone? Do you think there'll be a day the people can find happiness again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's easy to misinterpret the means of those that "would oppress us. But we can't go too long before the world at large can see the atrocities "committed, the terrible entities that walk these streets."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think there will come a day that these people can seize freedom for themselves against their oppressors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are unfamiliar to me." And he looks out at you guys standing at the peripheral of the amphitheater. "Travelers?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I fear the cold winter is looming. An ill omen takes this city, friends. You may stay to "give worship, if you will, then I recommend you continue on your way. There is little here but "dying tradition."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a prayer to give.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That strangers may come and bring with them salvation, and that the people will seize it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You speak in strange confidence for a traveler."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look for signs, Keeper Yennen. Look for signs. I'm going to hand him a piece of parchment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Signs of what, I might ask?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Salvation. Good day to you, sir.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Act cool. Everybody act cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We walk south.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We walk south. We leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you know what I've left him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As you're walking away, you hear his voice call out after. "Wait! What does this mean?" He pulls the parchment forward, revealing the symbol of the top of the de Rolo family crest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That... (sighs) What appears dead may not necessarily be death. And that with the shadow of death over the city perhaps there is life deep underground. Perhaps things that appeared ended and gone are perhaps continuing to this day. And may rise again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a persuasion check. Give you advantage on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nods his head slowly, looks back at the sheet. Looks back at you with a discerning look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's definitely not going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, not at all. You look like a dirty peasant right now. Takes it and hastily closes it and folds it and puts it in the pouch. Steps back over and gathers some of his loose tea leaves-- he was making himself some tea-- and looks about shiftily, calls over one of the other worshipers and begins talking with them as you guys walk away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head south.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: South it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kerrion Stonefell's stately manor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, which mansion were we at?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: The Countess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Countess Anna Ripley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which mansion is that out of the three?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the northeastern one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the northeastern one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she was which? Who was the Countess again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm assuming if it is who I suspect it is, it's Countess Anna Ripley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And who is she to you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is a terrible person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, she's the one who killed a bunch of your people, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's the doctor, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's the doctor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she is the one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we get to kill her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hope so. But let's-- one at a time. If we're lucky, maybe one a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a vitamin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a Flintstone's vitamin. Except it's assassination.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (coughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need some healing? Are you okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine. I'm fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan can make you feel good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) He can make you feel real good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go up and ask Keyleth, outside of his earshot, to maybe cast some sort of restoration on him, without-- He's fighting it. I don't think he's feeling well. Can you heal him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm mean, yeah. He's going to feel it once I cast it on him, but I can try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looks cold and kind of slimy, and he's coughing a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, that's harsh. Looks cold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's probably been up tinkering all night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who are you to talk, Crazy Eyes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look like like a dirty peasant right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if my-- I don't know if Greater Restoration will work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should only take 20 minutes to get to the house, shouldn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Approximately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not passing anything interesting on the way, are we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any other safe houses? Potential candidates?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are plenty of houses that currently don't show signs of life.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking mostly of the barracks or the Alcove.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but after we kill this thing, we're going to need to know where to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got some thoughts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thoughts? We need a place to retreat to immediately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Lady's Chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an amphitheater isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's quarters. They'll be able to hide us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What makes you think they're going to hide us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hunch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't we have a backup plan, in case they turn us out onto the street?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, my thought was if we take care of Stonefell, why don't we hide in his house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody will know, right? Let's do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good plan. They probably have some good wine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I always wanted to be a lord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let's go assassinate someone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy? I don't mean to beat a dead horse or anything, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it would make you feel better, you can do whatever you like, but I think it's just a tickle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. You're sure about all of this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I've got a hold on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They also have technology, now. They have weapons, guns, that they're developing. It could be a threat to many, many other people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that I'm fine with. No, not that I'm fine with. I mean, I'm fine helping prevent that. I'm just more worried about your sanity than anything else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a hold. And I respect that if you think that I'm slipping, you'll let me know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. You followed me into the fiery abyss, so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If that isn't a sign that I must be crazy, I don't know what is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Touché. I'll follow you, though. I'll follow you to the end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As the oldest among us, I say that he's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you actually the oldest among us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I assume so. How old are you people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somewhere between one and 50.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm 27, but I don't know how old she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, rainfall begins to hit upon the city--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ground immediately becomes thick with mud and sludge as you begin making your way through the city to the eastern side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go puddle hopping!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not a happy place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Low key.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Low key.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I look miserable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look wet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the Dust of Tracelessness to void out any footprints in the mud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's been washed away with the rain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do it. As you walk along, you do, some of the mud shifts behind you. It can be a little conspicuous if you're not careful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The old Shawshank Prison walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The Alcove is a little ways north. It would take some time. You're pushing at like 10:30 in the morning at this point, around 11AM. Are you going straight to the supposed homestead of Kerrion Stonefell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going straight there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going straight there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You bee-line it. You're all getting cold from the wet rain that is now soaked through your clothes. You make your way, and this home is a deep, red brick in construction. This house was not here when you lived here. It looks like what house was here has been demolished and rebuilt with sturdy masonry. It's a two-story building. There appear to be two guards currently set outside. Two regular leather-armor looking, more thugs than guards, but they're just both keeping under the overhang at the front porch to keep dry and grimacing at the weather. There is a gate around it. This gate is more for purpose than visual presentation. It's a black iron, nasty, jagged, rusty-looking gate. Not too dissimilar to the one that surrounded the graveyard. It's about a 20-foot walk from the gate entrance to the front step of the actual building itself. How do you want to approach this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's walk around the back, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, big guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax, you have your daggers back, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got them all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put a couple arrows in the holy oil that we have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Each holy oil is essentially three--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, can I just dip one arrow in, then, right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark that off from one of your holy oils, you have one of three uses of that, and that that arrow does have a holy oil essence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percival? If we get in there, what are the chances that this gentleman, Sir Kerrion-- Korean--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can mispronounce his name. It's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sir North Korean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sir Starbucks, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sir Starbucks. What are the chances that he's going to be in a coffin? Sleeping?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. All right. Good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would it be worthwhile to maybe say that the little boy and the old lady were caught hoarding crops and we brought them to this guy, see if we can draw him out of his house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's a cool plan. I like that plan!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is raining.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait, but I would be bait?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a long walk around the house to see if there's a way in through the back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's dark. It's raining.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I can't imagine that many people attempt to infiltrate this house.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How dark is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it's overcast, but it's getting closer to noon. Even though you can't see the sun, and it is dark clouds overhead, it is still a general universal storm light. Darkened daylight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like it's going to pass soon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It looks like it's probably going to be here for most of the day at the very least.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we go around once? Once around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Perception checks all around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking specifically for ways in the building other than the front door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking for clouds because I rolled a two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little bit of light from the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like candlelight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like candlelight or lantern light, the darkened exterior has made most of the sunlight that would warm a building or light it up from the inside has been cut off by the rainstorm. So, there is a necessity for internal lighting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any sign of windows that are blacked out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but you do notice that one of the windows to the far back side of the building where most of the light's coming from-- occasionally the light does seem to shift or a shadow moves past it. There's movement within that room nearish that window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're watching TV.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably. I cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, thank you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going through the cellar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is our meal still affecting us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! Let's go in quick!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it possible to see what the movement is, who it is inside that window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from this 25 to 30-foot distance from the building and you guys trying to be inconspicuous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's nothing between us and the building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the gate. The gate, and what looks to be a few rocks and a couple small trees that are on the actual grounds of the house surrounding it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the cellar door hidden from view of everything or is it out in the open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The cellar door that we saw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cellar door is out in the open, buttressed against the back of the house. It's up against the ground on the side. It has two doors that open up and lead into the cellar below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like anybody can see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you're standing? No. You're going to be hardpressed to get across without being in sight of somebody if someone were nearby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're between a fence, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on the outside of a fence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to try to draw them out or get to the cellar? Either way, those two thug guards are going to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are guards?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: There's two guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys moved around back. So you don't see the two guards currently on the opposite side of the house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the fence made out of? Is it the spear-y shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it poky up top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is poky. yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is poky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not super sharp poky, but there's iron rods.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, I could throw Scanlan over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you roll a two, you can get hurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you rolled poorly, it's going to deal some damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we do a diversion for the guards?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can't even see us, though!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, you want to sneak in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's try to sneak in and leave the guards there unless they notice us and then we'll just (thwip thwip).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, sure!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we sneak in past them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to try to pull one of the wrought irons off, maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd be down for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I puffed some smoke, would it draw attention to us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then never mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's raining. We can make a little noise, it'll be okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are the guards in the front?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're in the front of the building guarding the front door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Inside the gate at the house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Want me to heat up that metal bar for you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We still have to go over and in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just up and over the bar, athletic it. Acrobatics it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, can you bend that shit open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your donkey's still there beside you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, if Grog can frigging make a hole in there--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and Lou Ferrigno those bars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're more than welcome to. Go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The bar that he's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lou Ferrigno-ing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- Lou Ferrigno-ing, I'm going to cast Heat Metal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that going to burn his hands?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Put on some gloves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have any gloves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spit in your hand a little bit. Grip and bear it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's raining. It'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you cast Heat Metal on the bars and a certain area of this gate begins to glow with a dull orange to become a brighter orange, and portions of it going whitish-hot in places.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you just hit it with something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wrap your hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can use your axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rain, by the way, is puffing against it and evaporating as it impacts the now-heated metal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that'll be loud!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do you! You do you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? Okay, you reach over and grab it, your hands smoking on the-- use the pain! Use the pain and pull down the bars. You get a large portion of the gate to actually bend downward into an arc, causing the whole gate to fold inward on that side, making it much easier for anyone to pass through. However, you do suffer nine points of fire damage from the burn and your hands are currently scalded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now we can get Trinket in!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a hangnail on his pinky toe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go ahead and I cast Healing Word on his hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So it's 1d4 plus six. She's rolling it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, back to full!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the scarring stays for a bit. You do smell the burning flesh, but there's no lasting wounds on your hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can check to see if there's a lock on the cellar door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We gotta make it across the lawn first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we're in the back of the house.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're all just walking very quietly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're stealthing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, everyone make a stealth check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage on the stealth check, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, plus ten to your stealth roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't a safe place. You're currently, apparently made it to this side of the building unnoticed. But you don't want to stay here very long because you are visible to anyone who's on either side of the gate exterior.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going straight to the cellar door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up against the wall of the building.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give it a little (clunk) to see what I feel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is locked. It does gives resistance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get to work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do your thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it's been a while since you've done this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lockpicking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I already did it earlier when you weren't here. 14, that's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab the lock; you're familiar with this kind of lock. (clicking) You take the lock off the chain. The chains fall loose against the opposite side of the, or the inside of the door. You pull it open. It's dark inside. You can see the dry stone steps that lead down below the building as rain starts darkening them with drops that are hitting them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lean my head in really fast and just see if I can hear anything, and roll a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I stealth in a couple of steps look around and see if there's anybody in there, or hear anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I said it's good! It's good! Let's go! Right? You agree. We're never wrong!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Listening to the inside. The smell's a little musty, like a cellar you'd expect. But a little bit of dust and untouched earth. There's nothing down there; no movement, no sound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's clear, let's go! Ish!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all drop in. Darting into-- which is good, because you notice around the corner one of the giants is turning the corner. You all dive inside, close the cellar doors. Bringing you to the interior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if they're going to notice that fence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They might.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the pattering of rain across the wooden doors of the cellar. You made your way down underneath. And it is pitch black. There is no light source down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out my Flametongue Dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is a wine cellar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have Darkvision.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go ahead and use my flaming hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- is a small ladder in the corner that seems to lead up to a latched door that leads to the interior of the house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got up to it and listen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's fine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My ears are bigger than yours. Let me have a listen. Get down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Your ears are huge compared to mine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Definitely, look at them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your sister assures you she heard--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's nothing there!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't hear anything, either. I think we should just bust in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispers) Quietly!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, hang on! Grog just said wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I keep forgetting the rogue skill, so really I rolled a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what? You rolled a three and it becomes a 20?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For perception, I can no longer roll lower than ten, unless I roll a one. But if it's a two or nine, it's actually a ten for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rogues are pretty cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep, rogues are awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rogues are whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you put your ear up to it and listen carefully. And you hear pacing footsteps creaking against wood no more than maybe four feet away from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that one person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One person stops and then moves again, then moves again almost like there's pacing, and you hear low voices. It's a conversation; there's two voices. You hear one voice very muffled, but it seems to be similar to the voice of the gentleman that came across you guys on the street that actually briefly talked to Percy the day before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The old guy; the balding guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The balding guy with the long stringy gray hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's just reporting in. He's his frigging money collector.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About four feet from you, not over the cellar, but off a ways to it. You're not certain where this doorway leads to, the level of muffling you can hear through the floor leads you to believe that they're not directly above you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not directly above. All right. There's nobody right above us, but there's people in the house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might be close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to be clear--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, they're on another floor or in another room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we start: we're killing everything, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, good. Do we want to send one person out sneaky and then have a code word like Cheeto if it all goes wrong?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last time we did that, it went really well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we do that before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we didn't send anyone, I just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just go one room at a time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One room at a time? We have to get up through this latch and there's people right above us!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, you or me? You want to go invisible, or do you want me to creep in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you should have some fun, too. But before we do anything, do you want me to send a cloud up there of gross smoke to smoke out the area?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not let them know we're here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, before we do this. Keyleth, can you maybe make the gate outside not look like it's all bent to shit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zombie guards aren't going to-- giants are stupid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're stupid. I mean, there are the guys out front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's fine!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What could go wrong? This is a stealth mission. We'll be in and out of here in six minutes if we do this right. Let's go! Go, go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are you going in? Are you infiltrating?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go up and see what I see. Just above us, not far away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I touch Vax's shoulder and I cast Enhance Ability and I'm going to give you dex saves-- what do you want?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you want advantage on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not dexterity. Constitution. I'm feeling a little weak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Constitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's this for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Enhance Ability. So I think it's called Bear's Constitution or something weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage on constitution checks. Those are different from saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it does give him 2d6 temporary hit points, but those do not stack with the current temporary hit points you have. Constitution would not be of much benefit to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could just set a fire down here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do you want dex or anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty dex-y already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Instead, I say, good luck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonne chance! Vive la résistance!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to check and see if it gives at all or if there's anything to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creak) It gives.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It gives. All right, so I'm going to go up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Invisible or not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, stealthing up. All right. So, okay, hold on, I get advantage. 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no. Plus ten because Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dark interior, you use your Flametongue Dagger to look inside. You are inside of a closet of some kind, a ten by five closet. There are coats and outfits around you. You can push them aside. This looks to be like a small storage room that has been repurposed as a closet of some kind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am listening intently and feeling through as many pockets as I can find around me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to pocket from a few of the coats about 47 gold pieces in total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who leaves that much in their coat pockets?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dead people, that's who.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I make anything out through there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make out conversation. It seems to be between a voice you don't recognize and the gentleman earlier you met, basically saying, "With everything that's going on now, it's honestly "very frustrating that these people wouldn't do their share of the bargain. I, myself, I've been "doing my best to keep them in order, but at this point in time, I think we need to do another show "of strength in order to keep them working as hard as we have been." Another voice calms him down and says, "Don't worry, don't worry. Keep it under control. At the very least, we should have to be "ready, prepared. If what Lady Briarwood says, we should be having visitors any day now. And I would "hate to be caught flat-footed. So, we're going to go ahead and gather our arms, going to make sure "that we outfit the place the best we can. Traps, alarms, whatever is necessary to make sure that we "are not caught off-guard." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is about to be hilarious!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys came at just about the right time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to-- everybody hold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to wait for one minute and see what progresses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The conversation continues. The older gentleman begins talking about, "I don't like the "idea of there being any sort of conflict on our home turf. I wish they would just meet them out, "head them off, cut them off at the head. Why did we invite them in here? That seems to be a "dangerous circumstance."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're talking I say: we've got two gentlemen up here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two gentlemen!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I start climbing the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's time to start killing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog up first!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Places everyone, places!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog up before me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's opening night and I'm so excited! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth checks all around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Send up the goliath.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not enough room for all of you inside this room, this storage space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you go up, you push open the door into the next room and it is a-- for lack of a better term, a music room. There's a few couches around, there's a piano set up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it went closet to music room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're opening the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are opening a door to a room next to-- the wall you were listening to is the room next to you. This opens up into a room adjacent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A music room! How regal!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you push out into the room, it's dark in here. The only light that's coming in is from the nearby window. A little bit of sun's coming through from the rainstorm. You can still hear the rain pattering on the window and the second floor above you, there is no sound from the rain hitting the roof from this distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dart my eyes around. Is there anything that's useful in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Few vases, some books on the shelf. There is a door that is partially open that leads into hallway. A hallway that seems to connect the two rooms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which way are the voices coming from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The door is the opposite of the window and the room that you're in is adjacent to the room that the voices are coming from. The closet is in between the two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, between the two. So it is out, door, hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, out, door, hallway, and then the room where the speaking is coming from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to create a diversion of some sort? No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just run in, surprise him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to go around?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, we're stealthing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I pull both of their hands and I say--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's they?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog and Keyleth. I start pulling them through-- that's all right. Out the door. Along the hallway towards the voices.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt, that's a lot of maps you have down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? Really?! I'm offended. And I'm hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look back at Vex and I just go--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give you the worst evil eye I've ever given anyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too bad one's going that way and the other's going that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Blood, glorious blood! Grog's about to take some. Dead dudettes and dudes, Grog's about to make some! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the three of you move on ahead. The rest of you-- Trinket is unable to climb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I smack the back of your head again. And it's hard because I'm angry right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any of your rings on? Turn them inside and (impact noise).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the mom slap, exactly! It's the grandma backhand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the three of you stand at the double doors. You moved around to the hallway. Is there a change to this arrangement that you would like? You currently have Grog, Vax, and Keyleth at the front, and three of you in the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to stealth in behind Grog after they go into the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so there you are. I'll put you on the side of the door there. You hear the voices from the other side of the door conversing and talking back and forth. Scanlan, Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. Someone say something cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the plan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I put my hand up in the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: de Rolos, roll out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I click my boots together. (click) Feel that adrenaline rush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I kick the door as hard as I can and go right in!

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: (scream and cheer)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact noise) The door swings open, both of them slamming into the sides of these two bookcases. Immediately, you see behind the desk here and standing in the center.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Kiefer Sutherland.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a couch area, there's a fireplace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course. Damn guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys get a surprise round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, let's go ahead and roll initiative to get the order of things here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Advantage on initiative because I have that thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you alert? Do you have Alert? Is that what it is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have Feral Instinct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which I forget sometimes. That's better.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (sing with the battle music)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20 to 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Look at you, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Better figure out what I'm going to do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Scanlan is 16. 15 to ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half-elves!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five? Is that everyone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's everyone, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bitches gonna die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up first is Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull into that empty-- Oh, I've got a button, don't I? I'm going to pull into that corner right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to take two shots at that soldier in the corner, that guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The guards, you can see, are wearing dark studded leather armor, no cloaks. Both have rapiers or stilettos, daggers on their sides. They look at the sudden intrusion and begin going for their weapons. You caught them off guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 does hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's just a d10, where are my d10s? That's nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another shot to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a misfire. I'm going to do a quick repair. And that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does the repair take an action?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it takes a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Visually, nearly the same as the last day you saw, except maybe a bit of white on the sides of the hair. Armored with a nice set of relatively ornate leather armor, blue hues and blacks. The hair itself is this tousled brown. There's a boyish charisma to him, if he wasn't such an asshole. And the moment you see him, there's this boiling rage from within just to have that moment of sight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you're lucky, you die last.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a look of complete confusion, as he has no idea who any of you are. You look like paupers that literally burst into his office. That ends your turn, Percy. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hear him say that he has to die last, and in my rage, I race forward to that fuck in the middle of the room and I swing my Firebrand Warhammer at him twice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would make to make this first one a new feat called Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Minus five to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A two! So that's 11. Yeah, that misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely misses. As you swing in, (nervous yell) just ducks out of the way, and even though he's older, he reacted pretty quickly. Your weapon slams into the ground, splintering some of the wood. You peel back for a second attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That makes me even angrier. And now I'll use inspiration. 18... minus five, 23!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 does hit! Plus ten damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Plus eight is 13, 17, 27!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 points of damage, ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus four for the fire damage, but still the 27 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as he ducks out of the way, you bring up the hammer a second time and (whack) smack him right square in the chest. (grunts) The wind escapes him for a moment and the flames lick across the front of his chest. He catches himself on the table between the sofa and chair behind him. Gets back on his feet. Looks to you for a second and pulls out two short swords.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the best thing you could have ever done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know who you are, but you're going to regret this!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does Grog look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever other visual you want to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Potbelly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Huge potbelly. Grog, that ends your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. In theory, it is a surprise round. So you may have had advantage on that first strike, so go ahead and roll it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams) 26. Minus five is 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 23. No, you're right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage again. We'll say this is an additional third strike in reaction to him pulling his blades out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus! God!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (wham) The hammer slams him a second time and he almost drops his weapons. The actual end table he's resting on shatters beneath him and he, (grunts) has to get back up onto his feet. Looking genuinely fearful now. That ends your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You dropped your toothpicks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so he's been attacking the old guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those two flanking the big boss are just guards, right? They're just standard-issue guards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, they're both in studded leather armor. They don't look like guards, like armored, they look like thugs that are essentially there to watch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well, I'm going to run in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About how far in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make a left. I'm sorry, turn right, away from the action. And then I'll look at the guard behind and to the right of the big guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guy there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The good guy-- the bad guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guy there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, this guy over here. And I'll Dominate him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that also a guard? There are three guards?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are three guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're going to attempt to Dominate Person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom. He rolled a 17. That's a fail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is currently Dominated by Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Cold as ice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. So, as he pulls his heavy crossbow out, loads it, and aims it towards you, looks over his shoulder for a second, and trains it on his boss. Sir Kerrion looking confused by this whole circumstance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, Vax, and Vex, take your surprise rounds now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go first so I don't do any damage to you guys if you guys go in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm also probably going to do a ranged spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you guys talking about? Kill him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to go in, peek my head in and shoot-- first, I'm going to shoot from my Longbow of Sky Sentinel. And I'm going to use-- it turns into three arrows for one of my attacks, so it's three more attacks, potentially?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's two additional attacks against the one arrow. So you'd get four attacks in one round, essentially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! I'm going to do that! I'm going to attack him, the guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The bad guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two bad guys in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one that's in charge. Kerrion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sir Kerrion? All right, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I make an attack for all three arrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. That was one of them. You fire it, it splits into three along the way, and you roll for each attack on each arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that one doesn't hit. Well, probably not. 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 unfortunately does not hit, either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez Louise, what a waste of a storm arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you still get a fourth attack with your second--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the wrong thing. I can't; I'm going to Hunter's Mark him after this first one because it's a bonus action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I doing? 14, 15, 16, and then plus another d6, so it's basically like Hunter's Mark, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first arrow does an additional lightning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 is the first one. And then I attack again. I'm going to Hunter's Mark him now. Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't used your bonus action, so yes you can. Two eyes going all--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 does hit, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so confused right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Us, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. 14 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha. So your arrows split, two of them embedding into the actual desk itself and exploding with a burst of electricity. A third one strikes him in the chest and you can see it stick in the armor and (boof) jolt him for a second. He backs up a little bit, catching himself on the edge of the desk as the final arrow comes and strikes him in the shoulder. He cuts off the shaft of the arrow as it hits (grunts) out of anger and frustration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I totally shit the bed on that one, guys, and I apologize. I had things I wanted to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After she does that, I say: that was my grandma! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right, boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This little boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Adding to the confusion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to move at all? You would've had to move into the room to do that shot because you were outside in the hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were in the hallway when that happened, so I'd say you'd have to be in the room to shoot them. Where would you want to be?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, just right inside the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there in the door?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What kind of armor is Sir Kerrion wearing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, it looks like a very high quality studded leather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Studded leather?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I say I peeked in to shoot and then went back around the side of the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it up to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are the last ones to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This way. Right in between Sir Kerrion and this guard so they both have to save from it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take that, Sir Korea!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kerrion Stonefell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a thing of note, a storm cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is ten feet tall with a 60-foot radius centered on a point you can see in the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, so it's going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room won't fit it, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The room won't fit my storm cloud?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds like a great song.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It says if you're in a room that can't accommodate the cloud, it can't appear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pooper muffin. Okay. Well, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to consider your next move, Vax can go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, go Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am running straight towards what's-his-name, Kerrion? Is at the desk, so I just run right towards the desk, I step against the desk, leap up in the air and go (stabbing sound) into his shoulders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'm on the desk in front of him, going for his chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This guy is going down! One plus seven is eight-- what gets doubled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just the dice? But not the sneak attack damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the sneak attack damage, as well, but just the modifiers don't get doubled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So that was-- okay, two plus seven is nine. Nine, ten, 11, 12, 18, 23, 29, 33, 66 for the first attack, darling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 66! Here comes the second dagger into him at advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Surprise rounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is 28, so that obviously hits. And that is seven. And then the third dagger comes down. Is 29, and that also hits. So I've shanked his ass, that's an eight. (stabbing noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 15, is 70-- is 81.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. 81 points of damage in one round of combat. As you land on the desk, your daggers bypass the armor and they find their way through the top of the armor and sink past the clavicles into the deep portion of the chest. He (choking noise) from the impact and you hear him choke and blood splatters up from his throat. He reaches up and grabs your hands and lifts them off out of the wound. You see a gout of blood pour from the wound as you reach back and stab him a third time with the dagger as you catch yourself on the desk. He reaches up and kicks you, forcing you to get back on your feet with your daggers at the ready. The blood's beginning to pour. It's not a mortal wound, but it's looking really bad for him. He's not on death's door, but that definitely took him down a few pegs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give him a Vex wink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He looks at you and growls. Draws two rapiers from his side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two rapiers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He draws two rapiers? Do we get any indication by what we just saw if he might be a vampire or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can make an insight check? Ooh, yeah! 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't look particularly pale.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's also aged. He's a bit peppered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he has aged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He definitely looks wounded and unhappy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I ask a technical question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: According to Assassinate, any hit I score against a creature that is surprised is a critical hit. Any hit. So are the two subsequent attacks--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After the first hit--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's sneak attack. This says, "in addition, any hit you score against a creature "that is surprised is a critical hit."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any? He wouldn't be surprised after the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm usually under the impression that after the first hit, they're no longer surprised. They know you're there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Okay. Got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (grunts) Ow! (grunts) Ow?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I thought they were like 0.3 seconds apart, so I thought it was so fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double the last two attacks. Which were much less.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was 15, so it becomes 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So seeing Vax go up and get next to Lord Kerrion or whatever the shit his name is. I'm going to go and turn into a dire wolf this time. Mixing it up from Minxie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's like a normal wolf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But slightly bigger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But dire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But dire. It's white, a wintery wolf from the mountains that I'm from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are now filling up the entirety of the double-door frame right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to rush and use my pack tactics and flank Lord Kerrion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At your size, you can't quite get to him, unfortunately. You can try and move around this way, maybe. You will probably take an attack of opportunity from this guy, but you can try and move around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, from a random shithead? Yeah, let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your movement?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that. You move around and you get over there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that flanking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to be on opposite sides to flank.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Well, then, since Vax has that guy, I'll go for this guy. Take him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you move into that guy there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is the most peasant-looking direwolf ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this little peasant girl just went (growls).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that was a 19 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 2d6 plus three. That's not great, four, five, six, seven, eight piercing damage, and then do I also-- oh, and he has to make a DC 13 strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (cheers) So he's down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's knocked prone. How much damage was it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a lot. What did I say, six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of piercing damage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's knocked prone. (impact sound) Falls on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get my fiery stuff for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What attack was it? Was it bite?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Okay, he's down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Is that your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends the surprise round. Now we're at the top again. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take one step forward. I'm going to shoot that guard once, one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's 14, 15, 21 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, that's more than 19 points, because it's a fire shot, so 19 plus two, so 21 points, with two points of fire damage in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage. All right, (gunshot sound) you fire. There's a burst of flame that gouts out the side of the pepperbox, (impact sound) blasting into the chest of the guard off to the side. He's thrown against the wall from the sheer force of it. Reaches down and grabs his chest and looks at it, and you can see there's this red crimson across his hand, as you've actually blown a piece of his leather armor open and you can see the wound in his chest. There's a little bit of blood trickling out of his mouth, and he looks angry at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 21 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage, nice. (gunshot) You blast him, this time on the other side of the shoulder, you can see now this armor is now torn open exposing the wound here and his arm's now hanging to one side. He's (grunts). He's looking in severe pain and barely hanging on at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fall, damn it. Shooting him again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 to hit. It hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
