lines.text: Eight points of damage. All right, this is the final one as he's looking at himself; he's like (pained noises), angrily looks at you, picks his crossbow up and aims it at you. Before he gets a chance to, you aim your third shot, (gunshot) firing, hitting him right in the center of the head, (impact noise) blasting out part of his face, his body spins, and then he falls over into the plant in the corner, slumped over it there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I finish walking almost into the corner over there, right next to him, about there. Spend an action surge, taking three more shots at Kerrion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a sharpshooter round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 19, 26 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you crit on a 19?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't crit on a 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that'll do. 24 points of damage plus a point of ice damage. So, 25 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus an additional d6 points of damage for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay! Because he's an asshole. That's six more points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you go around and fire from the barrel, the shot fires out. And as you recoil you guys, for those who are noticing off to the side, this dark smoke's beginning to slowly pour out of Percy's body, out of his eyes and his ears and the hand on the gun. There's black smoke beginning to emit from his body and beginning to envelop the gun arm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all see this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For those who are paying attention, which right now would be pretty much just Scanlan and Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you don't see shit. Shut up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not crazy! No, and I'm at this guy's throat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a quick reload, and I'm going to fire again, with Sharpshooter, and I'm going to do a head shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The golden snitch strikes again!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it did! I can see it from here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I swear it's-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the additional d6, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the additional d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the d6 double or does it not double?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All dice rolled double. Then add the modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be angry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah it is!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gunslinger warlock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty "grood."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 42 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (gunshot) The first blast hits and you can see the cloak is blown off the shoulder and set aflame and actually burns to cinders in the corner. Sir Kerrion looks down and is like (grunts), and is looking very, very curiously. The second shot rings out (gunshot), and at this point now the smoke is wreathing your entire arm, the gun isn't even visible, it's just this giant column of smoke. (gunshot) The second shot rings out, this time hitting him in the side of the neck and the shoulder, blowing a chunk off of it so part of the bone is now sticking out it's like (noise of pain). He reaches back with his arm and is like with the rapier up, clutching it for a second and leans over and looks back over and is (pained panting) "Ripley."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just as an action, as a bonus action, I'm going to remove my hat, and I'm just going to say: Drop it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will this take an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To drop the spell? You can do it on your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On your turn, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I think that's next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He thinks it's Ripley. He thinks it's Ripley with the gun! Ripley's building guns!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Ripley that's doing the guns!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking Ripley!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. That finishes Percy's turn. It is now Sir Kerrion Stonefell's turn. Kerrion's going to use a bonus action to use Second Wind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, that's some sort of healing thing isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's healing. It's not much healing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, who's doing what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has 6,000 health points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kerrion's healing? Is it a regeneration thing or is he casting a spell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's a fighter action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that was with the head shot, you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it was with a head shot. So that means he has disadvantage on attacks for one round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And deals damage, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And deals damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a good boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sir Kerrion is going to, in the circumstance, is going to move this way just to hide alongside Vax, and since you're on top-- his both rapiers out, and you just jammed your daggers in, is going to do a flurry of four strikes against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage on all the attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His clavicles sticking out of his shoulders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use Uncanny Dodge for the first one that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, the first attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Rolled a one on the second. That is a 21 on the third attack. And, no, that's a 14 on the fourth attack. That disadvantage just-- swinging wide, gets one hit on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get that clavicle; be working.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Uncanny Dodge on that attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is eight points of piercing damage against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! That's nothing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Sir Kerrion. Sir Kerrion is now going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Turn invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's actually going to take a step back towards the wall. You get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I throw a dagger in his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Steps back and slams his fist against the wall (thudding).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, who did that?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Kerrion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's calling in backup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, he's calling in backup? Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, that ends Kerrion's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I keep smashing shithead that's in front of me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 24. These are just regular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 24 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Again, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits. Are you going into a frenzied rage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Regular rage. 23 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 12 on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. (whack) Is this with the fire damage as well from the hammer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. so the hammer strikes across the back, the broadside of his shoulders and back. (grunts) Looks up at you and looks over at Sir Kerrion being annihilated behind the desk and is trying to nervously gauge his circumstance. Second strike smacks him upside his body and he's like (panting) and he's trying to take in the surroundings and figure out a plan. All right, are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now Master Vouk's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not heard his name yet, but it's his turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The guy I've been smacking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Rogaine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm picturing him as what's-his-name in--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From Harry Potter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I know, me too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mr. Filch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Filch. Filch on steroids.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to use a-- okay. He's going to use a bonus action to disengage from you. He's going to back away just one step that way. Use his action to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has magic?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's going to Dimension Door out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Mr. Filch doesn't have magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's a squib!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a squib! Squibs can't do magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He knows this. He's making origami.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't you get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, instead, he's not going to use bonus action to disengage, he's going to use a bonus action to use Misty Step. Vanishes, reappears over by the wall. Uses the action to cast a level three Invisibility on both him and Sir Kerrion Stonefell. So they are both considered invisible at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the Missy Elliot step, I don't get an attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from that, unfortunately; it's an immediate teleport. So he just vanishes from in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's going to end--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That soldier hasn't attacked yet, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, his turn hasn't come up yet. Now it becomes Scanlan's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, I can't see anyone who's alive who I haven't Dominated already, except for the guy under the dire wolf. I will remind all my fellows to keep one alive to spread our terrorist message and I will run out to the hallway and say, Vex, get inside. Because I know reinforcements are coming, I cast Stinking Cloud out into the hallways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Stinking Cloud appears. What's the radius on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Stinking Cloud!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it's a 20-foot radius, isn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20-foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. So you just filled this entire hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Will it seep into the room as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can keep it localized to that area, you'll just be in your own cloud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, can I stop just short of the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stop just short of the door and fill this whole area with a Stinking Cloud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can hold that action until she comes into the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will hold that until she comes in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura's next, I believe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, next round. You are up next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will inspire her, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want a d10?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (singing) Vex be nimble, Vex be quick! Vex jump under limbo stick! Now you don't know how you're going to react because Vex has an attack! Oi!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing! How?! God! I don't get it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take your d10 inspiration. Confused, but accept the inspiration. A chuckle in the middle of a hearty battle is always worth a little inspiration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, so I go in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to stay there? You're just outside of the radius.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I stay in the doorway. Actually no, I back-- well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm staying right there. I can't see; is there a soldier right there next to the invisible guys, or is it just the invisible guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On that wall, it's soldier being eaten by Keyleth, and then invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There two invisibles, and then another soldier who I have already Dominated. He still hasn't had a turn?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Surprise round, and they're lowest on the initiative count.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, I'm going to do Lightning Arrow because that gets everything within ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Lightning Arrow on the soldier on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The one that Keyleth's attacking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one that Keyleth's attacking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say you don't really have visual on him from that position.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I move to a place where I get it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do a bank shot off the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you can see, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. Let's do it from there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. You have advantage on the attack roll because he is prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that is 4d8 damage to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then anything within ten feet has to make a dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that including your brother?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's everything within ten feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's also including invisible guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it's ten feet, he's not there. It'd just be Keyleth and Sir Kerrion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes it, 21, actually, exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 to little prone soldier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 19. As it snaps and it bursts, the electricity shockwaves out, he shakes and on the ground takes in the effect. The blast seems to-- is it half damage if they make the save?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the little prone guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's to anybody within radius.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody within radius takes 1d8 if they make the save and then 2d8 if they fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so roll 1d8.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So one damage to you, and one damage to Sir Kerrion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a spark of energy around the invisible form as it wavers in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good; at least he (electricity noise) around some.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn. Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I saw that spark in the air and I start knifing right into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Was that the last thing you wanted to do with your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Does the Hunter's Mark damage him, the invisible guy, still, if he gets hit with anything? Or is it just if I attack him with an arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think if you attack him. That was more of the burst in the vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, hearing him go (grunts) and seeing a spark right in front of me, I start knifing at that point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. At disadvantage on all the attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disadvantage? But I get advantage, so it cancels out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why do you get advantage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, no, I don't. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage on weapon strikes because he's invisible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The first one misses. That was it. So, the first two were terrible. That's terrible. That's also terrible. I whiff. I just (whooshing).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're swinging in the area, and you can't get blades to find any of his physical person. You're striking and arcing across the wooden wall behind him, causing these giant gashes. All right, that ends your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still bleeding!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you want to stay where you are right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You probably would've had to move up there to attack him. Oh, you're just throwing the daggers, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I back up. Is Keyleth on the desk?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she's next to the desk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm on the desk? No, I'll stay where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looking up and noticing that Sir Kerrion is gone and Vax is blindly stabbing into the distance, I'm going to drop my wolf form and cast Faerie Fire in that radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drop your wolf form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20-foot cube.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mark that shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Realizing my party members are clearly stabbing at something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Makes me feel like there's, perhaps, things he doesn't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Faerie Fire is an underused thing. It's really cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so both of their forms all of a sudden are outlined by this sparking purple halo that shows you directly where they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that's your turn? You going to move anywhere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll back up a tidbit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just back up a smidge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you back up an invisible form that just got revealed swings out at you with a rapier, an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure, whatever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But, he's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At disadvantage on the attack. He has advantage on her because he's-- although--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can see him now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see him, that's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is confusing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Faerie Fire kind of made this weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the books again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Faerie Fire always makes it weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ain't it the truth? Man, that Faerie Fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a minute, folks. Lot of overlapping effects, here, because everyone has magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now's a good time to go to the store and check out Critical Role t-shirt--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's at disadvantage. It has disadvantage on the attack. That is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Brand new t-shirt for sale, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Now, this guard gets up, (grunts) gets his crossbow, aims it up and, looking around the room, aims it, this would be-- seeing his friend turn on his boss briefly after you shouted that song at him, is going to turn the crossbow on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On me?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 16 to hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know any more. No one's attacked me in a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's your AC.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's 15 plus two because I've got some thing on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got the amulet on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The thug is then going to drop the crossbow on the ground and rushing up, pull out a mace that was hanging from the side of its belt and engage you right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he was coming for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought so, too. That would have been good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy is going to attempt to make two attacks against Master Vouk Strono. Has advantage on them because Faerie Fire. That hits. And, two attacks with a mace. That is 18. Yeah, hits with both. (whack whack) With the mace both times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that the guy who you charmed? Awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Who's this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The guy you charmed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not my guy, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that guy there is, yeah. Oh wait, he's attacking my guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whack whack) Bludgeoning. He's now going to try and make the saving throw to shrug it. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On my spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Yeah, he does not make it. Still under control. That ends the thugs' turn. Top of the round. Percy, you're up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go Percy, go Percy, go!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sharpshooter against Kerrion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sir Kerrion, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have advantage on that because of Faerie Fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 to hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Taking another shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was with advantage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pooper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 does hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 15 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. (gunshot) You see one blast hits the wall and causes part of the wood to splinter outward. The second shot impacts the partially invisible form. You can see a splash of blood across the desk in front. Partially spattering across Vax and one of his guards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy rolls!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the hell?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's making up for my gun failing four times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whatever, you possessed Voldemort.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Smoke arm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six, 16, 25, 31 points of damage. 31 points of damage with four points of that being ice damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Percy: how do you want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said that weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This against Kerrion, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is against Sir Kerrion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow! How do you want to do this? That's the logo that's on the shirt that's for sale right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, stop it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this the name on one of the barrels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't cheapen this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vengeance. Vengeance." Repeatedly echoing in the back of your mind. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to put on the mask, since he still doesn't know who I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pull the mask down, the bird-beaked element to the mask now wreathed in smoke, resembling, very closely, the entity that made the original bargain with you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk up to him. Yeah, there's no way to drop the illusion. That's such a damn shame.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, you told me to!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could have; I didn't. Fuck! (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could you do it now, for flavor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. The mask will do. I'm going to take one last shot. I'm going to look right at him, I'm going to catch his eye. This is for the de Rolos. And let me say: you were the one I was least looking forward to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's some cold shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all glance over at Percy. You don't even see Percy, you just see a humanoid entity made of black swirling smoke energy with the peaked beak of his mask poking through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not 100% sure what's going on. Can I take my Faerie Fire concentration that I still have up and move it over top of the black smoke figure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you move a Faerie Fire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know; can I move a Faerie Fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think when you use it, it just stays where it was. Could be wrong, but I'm pretty sure that's how it works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 feet; is he in it, perchance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From there, it's 20 foot, no. Not from where you placed it right on him, unfortunately. That's okay. Yeah, no, it just happens once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you recoil from it and the voice echoes in the back of your head, going "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to drop the gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drop it (impact sound).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remove my mask. Run to find something metal, something sharp, anywhere on the table. And just start scratching off the name on the gun. I'm just going to go to a corner and just start scratching the name off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's disturbed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sir Kerrion is gone. Annihilated. That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy's having all the fun. And I start smashing that fuck that's looking at Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there, okay. So you move up to him, (whoosh) swinging the hammer wide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's awesome. And the second one-- Yeah, that's pretty good. 28 minus five. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 15. 20 is the first one, with the fire damage. Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually that's 30.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, 30 is the first one. Plus 10. And 13, 16, 26 for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is disgusting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Happy Halloween, folks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great weapon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vouk is currently looking very--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's Vouk-ed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's Vouk-ed. All right. Is going to cast Haste on himself and is going to run, dropping invisibility, and leaping through that window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't the guard get a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard has advantage. A three. No, the guard misses, with a mace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! With your fire hands?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's with my staff, I'm assuming, right? Unless I wanted to deck him in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this would be with your staff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is with my staff, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just (whack).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it's five, so that's 11. I don't attack a lot. 13 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 damage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. As you smack him at that point--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just clothesline him. I see him running, I'm like (grunts).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unconscious and bleeding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good, yes, keep him alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man. Surprise rounds, man. You guys are nasty. All right. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I go run up to the guard I have dominated, and I just-- Is he still dominated, can I change the domination?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can cancel it, but otherwise he's just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, can I change it from "kill your boss" to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Kill yourself."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To "give up"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can tell him. You can't tell him to attack himself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I will tell him--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You-- Oh, go ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, tell him to go tell anybody else in the house everything's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Ooh! That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because we should kill the more powerful guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell him that everything's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. You there, guard! Go tell everyone that everything's fine. Go into that Stinking Cloud out there and tell all your friends that everything's hunky-dory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, Stinking Cloud is a concentration spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you were to maintain concentration on that, you would lose your Domination.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's your call. Which one do you want to maintain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The domination.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the Stinking Cloud fades from the hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stinking Cloud is concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe it is. Spells like that usually are, if it's to maintain--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is! I never wrote down a C next to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is where that circlet would come in handy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I run over to Kerrion's body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will be able to shortly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean the thing that Orion took from me? Yeah, the thing that I needed? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all right. He's used it pretty well a couple of times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, so I tell him to go warn his friends-- not warn his friends. Tell his friends that everything's fine. All is good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. Good to know. That ends your turn. Is anyone going to take any specific actions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to loot the bodies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running over to Kerrion and just going to rage loot him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go to the desk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. While you guys all do that, the guard leaves the room. You hear a few whispers in the hallway, a conversation with a person unseen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk towards the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A giant attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The conversation fades and the guard walks back, seemingly job done. Also is going to make a wisdom saving throw. That is a 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He remains dominated. You guys now-- For the moment, the threat seems to have subsided. At the moment. You're still in the house and there's still, apparently, things in the house. Whether it'd be guards or other individuals in the house that are on edge as they heard a series of gunshots ring out, screams, and other sorts of cacophony. The fact that this is even right now being handled is a very lucky series of rolls on his part.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He has magic. He's too strong. They could set better traps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can interrogate him, though. Get crucial information. He's an officer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't talk yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going through Sir Kerrion's body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking his swords, and I'm going to use his sword to get that deep gouge into the gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has two rapiers, so it's like holding a stiletto.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And anything he has on his body, I'm taking it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Never got round to actually using it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And once there's a good gash in the name, I'm going to sit down and breathe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you finish gashing the name out on the side of the metal and start breathing, you can see the name itself begin to glow with a slight dull purple glow and burn away from the metal, leaving just the scratch marks. From his body, you have two rapiers, regular rapiers, studded leather armor that is enchanted with a plus one bonus, and that potion of greater healing. So you can mark those down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping a very strong eye on Percy right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything on the desk, papers of any sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going through the desk? Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a lot. Yeah, it's tons. It's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You find wax seals, you find parchment, you find pocket change, about six or seven gold pieces just left in there. On himself though, on his actual person, on Sir Kerrion's body, you find about 320 gold pieces as his own personal fund. Looking through the desk, you find mentions of the bridge plan to move between the two continents. To go across the channel to Wildmount. Basically plans, the discussion, a lot of what they were planning to do with Emon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone write that down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also find a small notebook that just has some hand notes of his.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So mark that down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start tying up unconscious guy on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently-- He's got to zero hit points, he's bleeding out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about the dominated guy? He's about to save from it. Domination, he can save from it at any second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I know. I thought we wanted to interrogate--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which he does not; he's still dominated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a rag out of my pocket and I roll it up and I shove it into Kerrion's mouth while Grog is tying him up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kerrion's dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought he was out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vouk's.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The balding guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Balding. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We tie him up, he shoves a rag in his mouth, I put one hand on the top of his head and the other hand under his chin. Should we bring him back just a little so we can ask him some questions?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vouk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, but what are we going to do about dominated guy? Can we tie him up, too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, tell him to go sit in a corner, Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could save from that any second. We need to like off him or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There'll be time for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got it. Could you tell him to look in the corner?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is so wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't make his save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, do you want to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, this is so wrong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? We're asking questions. We got to bring him back, just a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you on Vouk's right? Or whatever-his-name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're on Vouk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we put him to sleep, or anything short of me knocking him out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can put him to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put him to sleep, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I have to drop my thing first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just knock him out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll do it. I'm really good at knocking people out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty image before you die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. He seems momentarily confused before the blow of the-- Are you hitting him with the blade or pommel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, pommel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we knock him out, should you make sure that whatever he tells people is truly fearsome? But not too descript about us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, he already told his friends in the hallway--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That everything was fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That everything's fine. So now we're just knocking him out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While all this happens, I'm going over to baldy. Lord Vouk or Mister Vouk and pop a Cure Wounds potion into him. How far down is he? He was just at zero. I brought him to zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he was unconscious and he was making his death saving throws. I was treating him for that circumstance. When you go straight to zero like that, you know--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. All right, I'll pop a Cure Wounds into him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The guy in the corner? Scanlan, could you go stand next to him and tell him a joke?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was giving him pretty flowers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're standing next to him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I gave him pretty flowers to look at.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You walked over and gave him pretty flowers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I Druidcrafted from a distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you standing next to him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I walk next to him and sort of distract him with a little soft shoe tap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. That's what I needed. I got an 18. Sorry, I got a 29. And that is eight plus 14, 22, six, seven, 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32. He is (impact noise) from barely damaged to nothing. He goes immediately unconscious in the corner, face down, in the middle of a bookcase.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop 18 points of healing into Vouk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (gasps, chokes)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The rag's in his throat. You are going to listen very carefully as my friends ask you some questions. You'll shake your head yes or shake it no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to ask him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not available right now.

lines.name: SAM, LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on. Come with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are the Briarwoods?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are the Briarwoods?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to do yes or no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are the Briarwoods--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- in the palace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (muffled moaning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes or no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just nod or nod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really smart. I feel good about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we take the rag out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can do spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to remind you that my friend over here can split you in half like an apple, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I nod his head yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (muffled murmur)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you seen the Briarwoods this week?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (affirmative grunt)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you like working for them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sounds uncertain)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they know we're here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (affirmative grunt)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they in the palace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sounds ambiguous)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sometimes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know where they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (negative grunt)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do they have pointier teeth than most?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sounds ambiguous)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sounds sad)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is mumblecore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is your life worth giving a little information?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (affirmative grunting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We want to know how to get into the palace without a problem. Got any advice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (eager affirmative grunting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now I just want to remind you. He can take your head off, your knees off, your cock off, anything, in half a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just give a little squeeze.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull the cloth out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast Blindness on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't know if he's blind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly he goes (muffled panic noises).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's blind. He's blind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give him a pat on the cheek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whimpers)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, now I feel bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Otherwise, my friend is going to make you about six inches shorter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to turn your head into a dreidel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're going to start talking now, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts in agreement)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In three, two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know a way in."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not guarded?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't think so. They've closed it off. If you can find a way through, they won't expect it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it the one in the forest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look, I can bring you to their project room under "the castle, what they're working on. Please don't kill me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the project room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they working on explosives?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They've been-- They've been working on something. It's hard to describe. I've only been "there once. It's beyond my interests, but it is part of the reason they even took this place."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lord Briarwood is a vampire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck is Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's powerful, I'll give you that. She scares me more than the two of them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it hard to talk with no teeth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's more difficult than expected, aye."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start to tilt his head and I'm like: showing us won't work, we need a location.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the caverns are there. I can show you how to "get there, I've been there. They've taken me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what they've done to the ground here? Do you know why nothing grows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stuff grows. It's how we do the farming."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stuff doesn't

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. Maybe it has something to do with what they're doing under the castle."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what exactly are they doing under the castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's an excavation, or they're building something. I don't know the details of it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've no idea what they want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I work with-- well, I

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have you worked with Sir Stonefell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Five years."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were you here when he took the castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes. I was part of the incursion."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good. You're very lucky. Because you're going to live if you show us-- And I bring out a map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't see anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. Drop the Blindness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He hears the crinkling of paper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Drop the Blindness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I drop Blindness and I drop Seeming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (scared, fast breathing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at me. Look at me. You're going to show me where on the castle is the secret entrance. Do you know who I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You will. Mark it on the map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down at his bound arms and legs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take his head and I shove his nose and his face right above the map. And I say: use your nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roughly around the entrance where you escaped when you and Cassandra left Whitestone, five years before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know where that is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That means we don't need you anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! I can show you-- I can show you where their project is. The tunnels. You need me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He'll set a good trap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to ask, when do the Briarwoods come out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not often. They don't need to. Kerrion does the work for them. Did the work for them."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those giants. Who controls them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lady Briarwood does. She's the one who made them."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all over the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's the one who made them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I propose something to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's strong with necromancy, she is."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shove the rag back in his mouth for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mark his face, take his tongue, let him loose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His eyes, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, just his tongue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His tongue?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mark his face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stick my two fingers inside of his nose, crank back on his nose, reach in, and rip his tongue out of his mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cover Keyleth's eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a bit more than I was--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said take his tongue! That's a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20, really? I'm feeling like such a bastard right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't even a slow scuffle. You just reach in and (wet ripping noise, pained scream) You immediately jam the cloth back in. The cloth begins to slowly soak with blood. You hold almost a pound of muscle: a now motionless tongue in your hand, bloody at its base. These tears are running down his face. (muffled sobbing and coughing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that good enough for your message?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take my gun. I'm going to shoot it very gently-- I'm going to shoot into the ground to muffle the sound. I'm going to take the heat of it, and I'm going to cauterize it. His tongue, so he doesn't bleed out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull the cloth out. (pained cry and choking sounds)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to mark his head with the still-hot gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (noises of pain) He starts screaming in pain as you're burning what into his head, the symbol of the de Rolo family?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a very complicated symbol. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do it. And then, I say we let him run out the front door and we set fire to the house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm good with that. I've got this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going after this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I like that a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would, though. You would.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trinket's downstairs. We should leave Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we forgotten that this entire town is full of evil, undead vampire people?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have we also forgotten that this entire town is looking for us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't know we're here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They will after we set fire on the house and send a man screaming through the street with your symbol on his forehead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't know where we live.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They will! They're going to go, "Hm, let's look at the burning smokestack of a house "and start there."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got the guy painted all over this room. They're going to find out one way or the other. Might as well do it with a little showmanship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're trying to make everyone know that we're here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're trying to start a rebellion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (voice cracking) Yeah, but-- yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, be the Mockingjay, Keyleth!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (giggles) Don't make me laugh. This is dark shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can stay the night before we release him and burn it down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Although there are a bunch of guards around.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: We can't stay the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, just burn it, then. Let's get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Fellow half-elves, you look as horrified as I feel. What do you guys think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it's a little stupid, since we have nowhere to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go back to our old hideout. We have the tavern. No one's found it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, I know what you've been through, to an extent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know what I've been through, to a certain extent, but yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We came here to wipe out a scourge on this city. Careful lest you become the scourge you've come to destroy. These people have eaten shit for five years. I'm not saying that man was innocent, but he's had a hard road. Everyone here has had a hard road. I am maybe willing to overlook what's just happened for all the hardship you have had, but careful how you are walking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, wait a second here, Vax. That was an enforcer. He kept the people oppressed. He worked for the Briarwoods and punished all of these farmers for not bringing enough taxes and enough tithes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we to turn into Jack the Ripper because of it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's what a rebellion is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do like ripping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no pretty way to do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm fully in support with burning down a house, I just feel like it might backfire a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I agreed to start a rebellion and let the people have their uprising, but I'm with Vax. I was trying to tell you this before we even came here, Percy. You don't want to become the thing that you are so desperate to seek vengeance on. How are we any different than the Briarwoods, at this point?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not fucking vampires. Look, what are our options besides burning the house down? I'm open to other ideas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can just leave it as a symbol of our terror.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've marked him. I'm willing to walk away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And where do we stay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Somewhere else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The tavern? Do we have to find another building?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know a barracks. It's not too far away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I agree with you, with burning the house down. Let's find anyone who's in here and get them out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they'll get out when the house catches on fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your soul doesn't need to be forfeit, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs heavily) Things are more complicated now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, is that last barrel for you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. But, if it was, would I tell you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are things more complicated, Percy? Clearly, we all just witnessed what just happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was unexpected.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'd agree with that, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) That's a longer conversation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These guards aren't going to stay out for long. We should set fire and get out of here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We burn the house down, and we find a place to hole up for the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, buddy. How's it going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over at the body of Sir Kerrion, which is still slumped against the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, we need to have that longer conversation soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Soon, but not now. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get out of here. All right, we're setting this damn house on fire?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bye, motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He falls out into the rain, (boof) falling on his side. (whimpers) He's being rained on, and he's trying to struggle with his bindings.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He'll get up. His feet are free. His legs and feet are free. I'm picturing chest and arms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then he gets to his feet and starts running.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, can you carry this unconscious guard out on our way out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Do I kill him first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you leaving Sir Kerrion's body?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sir Kerrion's body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you leaving Sir Kerrion's body to burn with the house?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take him, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might as well leave him out on the front step, or something. I'll grab Sir Kerrion--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you carry both of those fuckers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He threw one of them out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, there's the unconscious guard and the body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll grab unconscious guard and the body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He weighs like 600 pounds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to say: All right. Well, if we're going to light this damn house on fire and make it a symbol--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have fire hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're at least going to make it cool and make it the message that it's supposed to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn into an eagle and I fly to the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flying out the window that you just shattered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give me your symbol.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give her one of the parchments.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little hard to fly. You get up to the top of the roof.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Flaming Sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You transform into yourself again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all going to start going out the way we came.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I throw unconscious guy and Sir Dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hope you guys were ready to get out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open up a bottle of wine and take a giant swig.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys head back down to the cellar?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw them both out the window, including the body of Sir Kerrion (boof) out into the yard. You head back down into the cellar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Flaming Sphere, and I start moving it around on the roof and start drawing the shape of the de Rolo family crest on the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It will take you a few minutes. You now see, as you're finishing the symbol, Vouk running to the front of the building, and you hear the voices of two guards going, "Master Vouk? What "happened? Tell us. Unbind him!" "Yes, sir." And the two guards at the front of the building are talking with him. You finish the symbol.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I take my Flaming Sphere, and I throw it right at the feet of where the guards are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're on the roof, so you don't see them, but you know they're off to the side of the roof, so you can roll it off the roof down to them. They both freak out and react and seem to get into a defensive position. They start arming themselves, and you hear crossbow bolts being set into place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run over to the edge where the cellar was, and I go, (whispering) Grog. Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Come to the side of the roof!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear grunts)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, buddy. Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hi, Trinket. Get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys come out of the cellar now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Grog! Hey!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Catch me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Catch Keyleth. You guys are now out in the open, still during the day, rain pouring down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Running toward the woods? Where are we running?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head back to the inn. Let's try the barracks. We'll try the barracks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The barracks are attached to the castle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shit. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back to the tavern, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back to the tavern for now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to notice--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check real fast, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, do you have Pass Without a Trace, can you summon any more spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't. I mean, I can cast it right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to quickly, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, before we move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth checks?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we get the Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, plus ten, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have already disappeared into the various alleyways, making your way back towards the inn in the center of town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace, I mean, Dust of Tracelessness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, yeah, just throwing it down behind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They're giving chase. They're hearing the sounds of your footsteps a little, but eventually their sounds fade. You do hear in the distance a bell start going off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to go into the basement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start seeing people emerging from their homes, hearing the bell. And, you would know this, this would be a warning bell for whenever a fire breaks out in the city. You see smoke beginning to rise up, even through the rainstorm. The fire is fighting the rain. But the smoke is black and it's starting to fade. You gather the building itself did not catch fire enough to burn into rubble due to the rain, but you've probably left a very visible mark on the roof.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People begin to gather from the outside, and you see folks running past the alley as you make your way back to the tavern that you currently have as your base of operations. You all make your way in safely from the rain. Take a deep breath and come to understand that you've definitely started the motion of whatever it is you're intending to do. We'll see how it plays out in the near future. We'll call the session there for the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit got hairy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was dark, you guys. Super dark.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I found seven gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a sword, now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's October.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking of Percy and his crazy storyline--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's about to happen, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm guessing by now if you go on the Geek and Sundry website, you can find his playlist.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Music to burn a house to. Music to violently murder people to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go check it out, it's great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Music for a midnight murder. There we are. Actually, I have some art that I would love to-- can I put on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Taliesin art.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I drew pictures. Just in case everybody wants to see, this is the terrible thing we keep carving into people and things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or burning on rooftops.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then this is actually the de Rolo family crest. Just another fancy thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very, very cool, and well done, sir.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I drew a picture. So that shit happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Glad I'm not the only one who thinks you're crazy anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm crazy now. It's gonna be interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now we can handle it as a family.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, y'all's fucked up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That got way darker than I was expecting.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah. I'm sure that won't have any negative repercussions whatsoever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate you, Matt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, man. Did we hit 10k?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: 10,060. Currently Starburns is winning.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Starburns! Do it!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Here's what they forget: Jess and Steph are the ones doing it. If anyone's watched Jess and Steph's craft show, it will most likely end up being just a shaved face. If you think Jess and Steph can pull off Starburns, you're lying to yourself, and it will just end up being a clean shave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can get in there.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Moving on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can Sweeney Todd that.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, so. Tonight, guys, we're just gonna be reading off the names and we're gonna knock through 'em pretty quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys, so we have donating tonight to Extra Live, we have Connor Brown, Steven Sudeban Davis, Ravi Persuad, Mitchell DeFow-- sorry if I ruin any of these names, guys, by the way-- Tom Revely, Caleb Popum, Michael Holloway, George Rinn, PumpkinSpiceThisBitchTheFourth, Anonymous Donator, we have Patrick Toro, the Lost Tigers, Rebecca Case, Lewis Letter, Emma returns, Emma Engquist, I hope I'm not ruining that too bad, Pernil Ilfsen-- that's a cool name-- Arthur Gibbs, another wonderful anonymous donator, Maxine Poloquin, another great anonymous donator, Christian Huntlee, James Bell, John Reap, Killer Penguin, Monica Dahl, Kayla Ernest, Tim Pearson, another great anonymous donator, PumpkinSpiceThisBitch twice more--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Well, one's the original and one's the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We really appreciate it.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Since this weekend is the 24-hour Nerdist Extra Life stream, starting next week we'll go back to 826LA and get those donations rolling back in for 826--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But in the meantime, don't forget to go to LA2050 and vote for 826LA so they can win 100k.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I would also like to throw out there the other-- it currently looks like it's a race between Starburns, Freddie Mercury, and Fu Manchu.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I like Freddie Mercury.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Starburns' really kinda rocking it for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was gonna suggest-- we had the Hunger Games reference, so what was his name? Kerrion or whatever? The Gamemaster in the first one?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: There is no way Steph and Jess have the ability to do something like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I almost wanna see the tristache. Tristache is when you shave the handlebar, and then a smaller handlebar, and then a smaller-- (laughter)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Poll's out. The poll's out, dude.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the Hitler on the poll at all? (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a terrible person! That is the worst thing I've heard yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Charlie Chaplin.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We also have a video to show you guys from a community member about their own D&D Extra Life stream they're doing this weekend, so we are going to show that to you guys here once you guys sign off, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic, thank you so much.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again, guys, thank you all so much. Our love to the Team Hooman, Critter crowd out there, and is it Thursday yet? See you guys next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn straight!
